en.answer:
No, you cannot.

Effects with the『destroys a monster by battle and sends it to the Graveyard』activation condition can only be activated if the opponent's monster, which was destroyed by the battle, was sent to the Graveyard as a result, and is still a monster while in the Graveyard.

In the scenario you describe, the The Phantom Knights of Shade Brigandine that was destroyed is not treated as a monster while in the Graveyard. Therefore, the activation requirements for Digital Bug Scaradiator's effect are not met.

~~~

Similarly to Digital Bug Scaradiator, the following effects' activation conditions are only met if the monster that was destroyed by battle is also still a monster in the Graveyard:
● Ancient Warriors - Ambitious Cao De
● Infernoid Attondel
● Odd-Eyes Saber Dragon
● Odd-Eyes Dragon
● Performapal Salutiger
● Gem-Knight Topaz
● Stygian Street Patrol
● Infernity Destroyer
● Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Gorilla
● Gladiator Beast Samnite
● Flamvell Firedog
● Chaos-End Master
● X-Saber Uruz
● Skelesaurus
● Red-Eyes Zombie Dragon
● Hydrogeddon
● Hamon, Lord of Striking Thunder
● Darkblaze Dragon
● Volcanic Doomfire
● Guardian Angel Joan
● Cyber Angel Izana
● Cyber Angel Benten
● Black Luster Soldier - Super Soldier
● Frightfur Chimera
● Elemental HERO Shining Flare Wingman
● Elemental HERO Flame Wingman
● Evil HERO Inferno Wing
● Masked HERO Dian
● Masked HERO Divine Wind
● Masked HERO Anki
● Blackwing - Shura the Blue Flame
● Blackwing - Boreastorm the Wicked Wind
● Ignoble Knight of High Laundsallyn
● Crimson Blader
● Goyo Chaser
● Goyo Predator
● Goyo King
● Goyo Guardian
● Thought Ruler Archfiend
● Number C105: Battlin' Boxer Comet Cestus
● Number 32: Shark Drake
● Kachi Kochi Dragon
● Vector Scare Archfiend
● Sunvine Thrasher
en.question:
My opponent's The Phantom Knights of Shade Brigandine, which was Special Summoned as a monster by its『Special Summon this card in Defense Position as a Normal Monster』effect, is destroyed by battle with my Digital Bug Scaradiator.

Can I now activate Digital Bug Scaradiator's『attach that destroyed monster to this card as material』effect?
en.title: If Digital Bug Scaradiator destroys The Phantom Knights of Shade Brigandine, which is treated as a monster, by battle, can Digital Bug Scaradiator's effect be activated?

ja.question: 自身の『①：このカードは発動後、通常モンスター（戦士族・闇・星４・攻０／守３００）となり、モンスターゾーンに守備表示で特殊召喚する（罠カードとしては扱わない）』効果によってモンスターカード扱いとなっている「<<12267>>」が、「<<12326>>」との戦闘で破壊され墓地へ送られた場合、「<<12326>>」の『②：１ターンに１度、このカードが戦闘で相手モンスターを破壊し墓地へ送った時に発動できる。破壊したそのモンスターをこのカードの下に重ねてX素材とする』モンスター効果を発動することはできますか？
ja.title: 「<<12326>>」がモンスターカード扱いの「<<12267>>」を戦闘で破壊した場合、そのモンスター効果を発動できますか？
